ai-tha-ap245:0.3_0: The Elders said: “Noble Ones in the Discipline
ai-tha-ap245:1.1_0: “When you’re born in the midst of the Veṭhadīpa,
ai-tha-ap245:2.1_0: I shaved off my hair and beard,
ai-tha-ap245:2.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap245:2.4_0: for the bonds of the world.
ai-tha-ap245:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap245:3.2_0: As a bird was worshipped by the flowers,
ai-tha-ap245:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap245:4.1_0: When they have a seven eons,
ai-tha-ap245:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandā.
